commit_message:
Reduce profiler overhead to 1.04x: interleaved Accumulator

Generally group by thread, not zone; but also interleave to prevent false sharing. Avoid indirection from allocation.

Enabled (Gemma3 4B):
Total analysis [s]: 0.024436
real	0m8.226s
Disabled:
[ Timing info ] Generate: 5574 ms for 91 tokens (16.32 tokens / sec)
real	0m7.895s

Previous overhead was 1.05-1.06x.
